title: Refund Tokens for Reworked Champions
body: I had an idea, where when a champion gets reworked, if you had bought that champion (and any skins for them), you would be able to refund them, as long as you had a skin for them (that had been bought), or x amount of games played with them (up to you). If a skin/champion had been gifted, you would not be able to refund them, but if they had been hextech crafted, you could return it into the shard and essence/permanent, but of course you would have to meet the games played requirement if the champ/skin was hextech crafted, because that doesn't necessarily mean that you have played the champion, as hextech crafting is random.
